transcript:
here's what people who have avoided
attachment Style say and what they
really mean it's like you always have an
issue I struggle with communication and
it feels overwhelming when you want to
talk about things I don't know what the
big deal is I'm not consciously aware
that I keep you at a distance when you
feel deprived for attention I'm
completely confused I don't know about
us right now I feel like we're getting
too close right now and that's my
emotional trigger so I question
everything including our relationship I
didn't have these issues with my ex I
romanticize my past relationships even
though the same patterns I have here
existed there
